name: PLAYING THE ALMIGHTY
description: " Playing the Almighty" has the player take control of the " Almighty", which is another word for powerful, but not only powerful as the "Al" suggests the character is the most powerful and without equal or superior. This game has the player being or taking control of a nearly invincible being who can create, destroy or merely observe the universe or world or even time itself. I wanted the player to feel a sense of what a person, not omniscient or perfect, but just a being with near unlimited power would do. This includes what would probably realistically happen but still, with branching options.
